Class TestArgsParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • TestArgsParser
  • public class TestArgsParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Unit Testing for ArgsParser class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TestArgsParser()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void testCoreCountNotInt()
      Test exception thrown when the number of cores specified by the user is not an integer
      void testDefaultArgs()
      Tests default value is correctly assigned when it is not parsed as an input argument to the constructor method.
      void testDotExtensionMissing()
      Tests exception throw when the .dot extension is not included as part of the filename when it is provided as an command line arg.
      void testIncompleteOptionalArg()
      Test exception throw when optional arg is given but incomplete.
      void testManualOutputName()
      Tests if the parser is able to recognise and store the name of the output file specified by the user
      void testMissingMandatoryArg()
      Tests exception is thrown and caught when mandatory arguments are missing.
      void testParallelCoreParse()
      Tests whether the argsParser is able to recognise the user specified number of cores to be used for the execution.
      void testProcessorsNotInt()
      Tests exception throw when the argument for the number of processors allowed for execution is not given as an integer.
      void testUnknownArgSupplied()
      Tests exception throw when user gives an invalid optional argument at the command line.
      void testValidMandatory()
      Tests the constructor method of ArgsParser with a minimum allowed number of args.
      void testVisualiseParse()
      Tests whether visualisation flag is set correctly when parsed as an input parameter.
